title: Karthus no Audio in game
body: Just played a game as Karthus, he didn't have any audio from tuants, spellcasts or movement at all. The only sound that worked was spell affect sounds like Q detonating and so on where the only things that worked

replies.body:
Hey Asriel Dreemerr - 

Thanks for the report! We're of the issue and are working on a fix!
